content.rendered:
The devil is tired of being the lord of hell, so he moves to Los Angeles, where he opens a nightclub and makes contact with a murder detective.”

Number of seasons: 6 (2016-2021)

Status: Finished

Creator: Tom Kapinos

Channel: FOX, Netflix

Starring: Tom Ellis, Lauren German, Kevin Alejandro
